# a.
# The data contains two sets of observations for shoe size, height, and gender.

# b.

```{r}
males <- sframe[sframe$Gender == "M", c("Shoe_size", "Height")]
females <- sframe[sframe$Gender == "F", c("Shoe_size", "Height")]

males
females
```
